meteorShowers.name: Draconids
meteorShowers.frequency: Active annually, variable intensity, occasional meteor storms

meteorShowers.name: Taurids
meteorShowers.frequency: Active annually, separate branches for Northern and Southern Taurids, peaks in late October and early November

meteorShowers.name: Leonids
meteorShowers.frequency: Active annually, peak around November 17-18, periodic meteor storms

meteorShowers.name: Geminids
meteorShowers.frequency: Active annually, peak around December 13-14, one of the most reliable meteor showers
